name: MicroArchaeology
description:
Hyper-casual arcade game made for Miz Jam 1.

Switch between your pick and dowsing rod to find all the artifacts before your pick breaks. The dowsing rod reveals the distance from the nearest artifact, while your pick will dig it up. Careful not to miss, as your pick is surprising fragile.

Due to work and family responsibilities was only able to put in ~20 hours of work into it.

Post your high score!
